title: VERBATIM: Michael Cohen is 'radioactive' -Daniels' lawyer
text:
VERBATIM: Michael Cohen is 'radioactive' -Daniels' lawyer Monday, April 16, 2018 - 01:26 
  and her attorney said on Monday that President Trump’s longtime personal lawyer Michael Cohen is ''radioactive'' and that anyone who's retained his services should be worried.   and her attorney said on Monday that President Trump’s longtime personal lawyer Michael Cohen is "radioactive" and that anyone who's retained his services should be worried.  //reut.rs/2JNZJMC
